About.funfact: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies or working on personal projects.

Privacy.information_collected: We only collect information necessary for the guestbook functionality, including your name, email, and profile picture from your chosen authentication provider.
Privacy.usage: Your information is used solely to display your messages in the guestbook and to provide a personalized experience.
